task:
How to Make Grits A Deep South staple.
Ingredients and Materials:
Milk
Butter
Shredded Cheese
Almond Milk
Vegtable oil
Almond Parmesean
Cornmeal
1.5 tsp kosher salt
Water
Medium Pot
Wisk
Recipie:
Put stove on medium-high (7-8)
Add milk, water, and salt to pot and bring to a boil
Gradually add cornmeal while whisking
Turn stove down to low (2-3) and cover with lid
Remove lid and wisk every 3-4 minutes
Cook for 20-25 minutes
Remove from heat and add pepper and
Add to taste
Serve
Original recipie: http://www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/alton-brown/cheese-grits-recipe.html
